IONIAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. 12 METER S/V EROS II, ONE PERSON ON BOARD, UNREPORTED.
   DEPARTED CORFU (39-36.00N 019-52.00E) ON 14 APR
   DIRECTED TOWARDS CATANIA ITALY (37-30.60N 015-04.80E).
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   PHONE: 390 6592 4145,  659 084 409,
   EMAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 821/24.
